data.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past.
data.author: George Orwell

data.quote: None but ourselves can free our minds.
data.author: Bob Marley

data.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
data.author: Lance Armstrong Sally Jenkins

data.quote: You never fail until you stop trying.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: You have to be lucky to be successful, but luck can be engineered.
data.author: Zat Rana

data.quote: Don’t take too much pride in your accomplishments. They’re not all yours.
data.author: Zat Rana

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Don’t raise your voice, improve your argument.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: We are still masters of our fate. We are still captains of our souls.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Strong lives are motivated by dynamic purposes.
data.author: Kenneth Hildebrand

data.quote: Take calculated risks. That is quite different from being rash.
data.author: George S. Patton

data.quote: I can, therefore I am.
data.author: Simone Weil

data.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
data.author: George S. Patton

data.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.
data.author: Jane Smiley

data.quote: A real entrepreneur is somebody who has no safety net underneath them.
data.author: Henry Kravis

data.quote: If you genuinely want something, don’t wait for it — teach yourself to be impatient.
data.author: Gurbaksh Chahal

data.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
data.author: Jim Ryun

data.quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
data.author: Mae West

data.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
data.author: Chris Grosser

data.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
data.author: Wayne Gretzky

data.quote: The longer I live, the more beautiful life becomes.
data.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

data.quote: If you always do what interests you, at least one person is pleased.
data.author: Katharine Hepburn

data.quote: Do good, live in the most positive and joyful way possible every day.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Until you change how you get things done, you'll never know what works best.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.
data.author: Steve Maraboli
data.book: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

data.quote: I belive I can fly, I believe I can touch the sky.
data.author: R. Kelly

data.quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us
data.author: Richard Wagner

data.quote: Always ask yourself: What will happen if I say nothing?
data.author: Kamand Kojouri

data.quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
data.author: Charles Baudelaire

data.quote: We cannot do everything at once, but we can do something at once.
data.author: Calvin Coolidge

data.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Those who don’t believe in magic will never find it.
data.author: Roald Dahl

data.quote: Be yourself and people will like you..
data.author: Jeff Kinney

data.quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease forever to be able to do it.
data.author: J.M. Barrie

data.quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
data.author: Sylvia Plath
data.book: The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

data.quote: You are your best thing.
data.author: Toni Morrison
